 About 
 
 As  the  intelligence  of  technology  increment ally  increased  over  the  years ,  many  jobs  for  the  human  race  had  been  made  redundant ,  forcing  Earth âĢ Ļ s  citizens  to  head  out  into  the  suburbs  seeking  labor ,  aided  by  ex os ke let ons  to  improve  their  efficiency .  All  sexual  activity  without  consent  is  a  criminal  offence ,  regardless  of  age .
